subSections.text:
{{zh-pron
|m=shǐ
|c=sai2,si2
|c_note=sai2 - vernacular; si2 - literary
|h=pfs=sṳ́
|md=sāi/sṳ̄
|md_note=sāi - vernacular; sṳ̄ - literary
|mn=sái/xm,zz,tw:sú/qz:sír
|mn_note=sái - vernacular (including Quanzhou “to fuck”); sú/sír - literary
|mn-t=sai2
|w=2sr
|mc=1
|oc=1,1
|cat=v,n
}}

subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# to [[order]] to do
# to [[send]]; to [[dispatch]]
# to [[let]]; to [[make]]; to [[cause]] to
# to [[use]]; to [[employ]]
# to [[play]]; to play with; to [[resort]] to; to [[dally]] with
# to [[indulge]]
# {{lb|zh|Cantonese}} [[need]] to [do something]; [[have to]]
#: {{zh-x|你 唔使 攞{lo2} 咁 多！|You don't need to get so much!|C}}
# {{lb|zh|Cantonese}} [[need]] [something]; [[require]]; [[want]] [[strongly]]
# {{lb|zh|Quanzhou|_|Min Nan|vulgar}} to [[fuck]]

|cat=v,n
}}
